Package com.i2group.apollo.adminservice

The Intelligence Analysis Platform admin service provides clients with the ability to perform administrative functions on the whole system.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAdminService A set of methods for performing administrative functions on a running instance of the Intelligence Analysis Platform.
 

Class Summary
SchemaValidationException.Fault Contains information about the enclosing SchemaValidationException.
 

Exception Summary
SchemaValidationException The exception raised when an attempt is made to use an invalid schema.
 

Package com.i2group.apollo.adminservice Description

The Intelligence Analysis Platform admin service provides clients with the ability to perform administrative functions on the whole system.

The admin service contains two methods that affect fundamental features of the Intelligence Analysis Platform.

Web methodDescription
CreateDataSource Creates the data source object that represents the Analysis Repository for this instance of the Intelligence Analysis Platform, and specifies the schema that the repository will use.
UpdateDataSourceSchema Updates the Analysis Repository to use the specified schema, subject to strict rules about how the new schema can differ from the current one.

Data source creation is a one-off operation through which the client sets the schema for the Analysis Repository. The schema cannot be replaced without rebuilding the repository from from scratch. The schema can be updated, but only in ways that add to the old schema. Schema updates that would invalidate existing data are not allowed.

Since:
2.0
